not-a-thing-test

0.3.6
  • Intro
Need help reading this?

Intro

Installable via npm install --save not-a-thing-test, it can also be used directly in the browser.

Download

The source is available for download from GitHub. Alternatively, you can install using npm:

$ npm install --save not-a-thing-test

You can then require() not-a-thing-test as normal:

const notAThingTest = require('not-a-thing-test')

In the Browser

not-a-thing-test should work in any ECMAScript 2018 environment out of the box.

Usage:

<script type="text/javascript" src="index.js"></script>

The portable versions of not-a-thing-test, including index.js and index.min.js, are included in the /dist folder. not-a-thing-test can also be found on unpkg.com under

  • https://unpkg.com/not-a-thing-test/dist/index.min.js
  • https://unpkg.com/not-a-thing-test/dist/index.js
